articles.description: Nathan Hales wins Great Britain's third gold medal of the Paris Olympics in the men's trap shooting final.
articles.title: Olympics shooting: Great Britain's Nathan Hales wins men's trap gold

articles.description: A striking image of Brazilian surfer Gabriel Medina at Paris 2024 has captured imaginations across the globe.
articles.title: Olympics 2024: Is this gravity-defying surfing image the photo of the Games?

articles.description: Will the triathlon become a duathlon? What will make the River Seine safe? BBC Sport looks at the key questions after the men's individual triathlon is postponed.
articles.title: The key questions answered after Olympic triathlon postponement

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.title: Olympics 2024: Top five stories from day four of Paris Games including Antetokounmpo & Richards

articles.description: Defending Olympic champion Charlotte Worthington misses out on final of the women's BMX freestyle in Paris.

articles.description: Matthew Mott steps down from his role as white-ball coach after England's disappointing performances in the 50-over and 20-over World Cups.
articles.title: Matthew Mott: England cricket white-ball coach steps down from role but Jos Buttler to remain captain

articles.description: Athletes wore ice vests and spectators carried hand fans as a heatwave hits the Olympic Games in Paris.
articles.title: Paris 2024: Athletes wear ice vests as 35C temperatures affect Olympic Games

articles.description: British men's number one Jack Draper fades in the sweltering Paris heat as the nation's interest in the Olympics singles ends.
articles.title: Olympics tennis: Team GB's Jack Draper loses to Taylor Fritz at Paris 2024
